mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, content, images, video, tags, status, audit_status, audit_reason, like_count, comment_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE square_post SET like_count = GREATEST(like_count + #{likeDelta}, 0), comment_count = GREATEST(comment_count + #{commentDelta}, 0), update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM square_post WHERE status = 1 AND audit_status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM square_post WHERE status = 1 AND audit_status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM square_post WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status != 0
